SyncfusionLicense.Notes: To get a FREE Syncfusion Community License: 1. Visit https://www.syncfusion.com/products/communitylicense 2. Sign up (free for individual developers, small businesses) 3. Replace YOUR_LICENSE_KEY_HERE with your actual license key 4. Set Status to 'Active'

Instructions.Step2: Create free account and download Community License
Instructions.Step3: Replace YOUR_LICENSE_KEY_HERE with your license key
